TopicTitle: Custom Control Pad + Sneak Peek video

Articles.Content:
Will there be an option for pc?? It would be nice to also be able to use this on a second monitor to be able to de-clutter the ksp window. I think that this is a great mod, especially if you have a tablet (not yet for me), but would be nice to be able to use on second monitor, or different machine (laptop) etc....

While working on it, we reached the same conclusion why not make it also for pc ?! So yes, we are working on that too, it will come a little bit after android version (as touch screens are mostly on IOS and Android) but yes, it will come to pc too.

Thanks for your suggestion!

Ok, quick question,if I was looking to beta test, what sort of info would I need to send?

Great thanks for your interest blueshark15, we have already assigned all beta slots we had for KSP users (we don't have many available and CCP supports a ton of apps and games...). BUT we are soon going to extend the beta program (for version 1.1) and at that point your name will be taken into mind.

A Scott manly video of steam gauges:

If i understand L.J.Silver's intent(he is the owner of this mod, i am just one of many testers) You could create your own layouts and import them into this tool and use them, so the sky is really the limit for what you want this to look like.

We are working on a general way to make gauges and other kind of information displays very customizable and extendable. As toyoawolf pointed out our goal is to be able to replicate almost all kind of GUI on CCP on the mobile device. BUT this will be introduced and better described with version 1.1.

GREAT GREAT Thanks to all for your interest and feedback, and special thanks to beta testers who have been using CCP and reporting about it.

This won't happen, we are actually doing our best to allow users to share theyr "Layouts" (or templates) with other users, together with the application you will have some default layouts for most common applications and "partner games" (x3 just added), plus we will provide some GUI skins for them (neutral, metal, spaceship , Star Trek etc). But users will be able to modify them, create new ones and share them with other users at no additional charge

We are also working with other developers to soon have a free version of the app which users can use with some games and apps free of charge (our API allows for an application to send and display a layout on CCP app running on mobile device).

And, while we don't yet have a release date, we have decided to release the app at a very special price for the first days, so that the various forum users from ksp community (and other games as well) can get at it at super discounted price.
